com.github.ontruck.moped

Class DistanceSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.ontruck.moped.DistanceSensor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDistanceSensor

    public class DistanceSensor
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDistanceSensor
    This class represents the distance sensor. It can provide both filtered and raw distance data.
